title: Cyber Monday Deals: OneAir Elite slashes prices on airfare and all your travel needs, now just $79.97
content:
Macworld

You’ve probably seen some of the low-price flight alert clubs that serve up deals on airline tickets. They’re unquestionably a huge money saver. But what if you were part of a club that served up discounts on all aspects of your travel, from tickets to hotel reservations to rental cars and beyond? That’s where OneAir separates itself from the pack.

Now, you can land a lifetime subscription to a OneAir Elite Plan membership at a major Cyber Monday discount,  just $79.97.

As a OneAir Elite member, you can save up to $2,000 on every trip you book. That starts with OneAir’s advanced AI technology, scanning and tracking millions of business, first, premium, and economy class fares over and over to find the absolute best flight deals faster and more accurately than other services.

Unlike other services that send customers to various outlets to buy their tickets, OneAir’s mobile app for iOS and Android makes it easy to leap into action in seconds, search for deals, and book flights right in their app in one fluid stroke. 

Plus, OneAir also offers their OneAir OneClub Exclusive so members can book hotels at up to 60% off, as well as rental cars and other activities at up to 25% off. It’s like buying an entire vacation at a wholesale price.

And since it’s Cyber Monday, you can lock in OneAir’s elite services at well below its regular price of nearly $800. Instead, become a OneAir Elite member this week for a ridiculously low $79.97.

 

OneAir Elite Plan: Lifetime Subscription (Save on Business, First, Premium Class Flights, Hotels & More!) – $79.97

Travel your way for $79.97

Prices subject to change.
